summary: Adds a player home with a small dungeon, weapon with custom texture and two unique sets near High Hrothgar.
descriptionHtml:
[b]About the mod:[/b]
This mod adds a player-owned house, the \"Voice Master House\", near High Hrothgar.
To get the key to the house, you must brave a small dungeon with a scaled encounter.

The house includes multiple secrets - or small \"easter eggs\" if you want - that you can find. (Hint: Find the to-do list!) Can you find out what happened to the person who lived here before?

These secrets include two custom three part gear sets, a custom texture dagger and multiple miscellaneous things scattered around the house and in the dungeon.

The house has everything your Voice Master needs for blacksmithing, alchemy and enchanting!


Author note:
Whew! It\'s taken many hours and nights of sitting in front of my PC, but I finally got to a point that I can release the mod for public testing.

This has been an interesting learning process, and I personally am quite happy how it turned out, since this is my first \"full\" mod.

The house was at first supposed to be just a small house mod, but as I went on I wanted to add a dungeon, new gear and a small story to go with it.

Thank you for downloading, hope you enjoy!
Remember to endorse if you liked the mod!

Bugs and fixes:
Find anything? Report it in the comments section or through a PM!

To be fixed:
- Found a few small ugly places where the stones clip through the floor, but these are very minor. Shouldn\'t be too easy to spot.
- The weapon plaguette over the alchemy table and near the downstairs door sometimes won\'t work.
author: MrRightclick
